channel.title: About on Jan-Philipp Fränken

item.title: About
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Short Bio Hello! I am a PhD Student at The University of Edinburgh working in the Computational Cognitive Science Lab with Neil Bramley and Chris Lucas. I am broadly interested in both natural and artificial intelligence. Currently, my PhD focuses on program induction (specifically, hypothesis adaptation) and probabilistic and causal reasoning in social networks. To study my research questions, I use computational and agent-based models and run online multi-player experiments using MTurk or Prolific.
